title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Why Usage-Based Billing Must Be Treated as Infrastructure (AIM109)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 为什么基于使用量的计费必须被视为基础设施 (AIM109)
abstract: Monetization is now an infrastructure challenge. With usage-based, outcome-based, and hybrid pricing models, billing can’t go down—even if your product does. It underpins revenue, customer experience, and financial reporting. At scale, this means processing millions of interdependent events in real time with four-nines reliability, while ensuring changes cascade across pricing, credits, dashboards, and ledgers. This talk shares the infrastructure principles needed—scalability, reliability, modularity, orchestration, and extensibility—for billing at true scale. This presentation is brought to you by Metronome, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 货币化现在是一项基础设施挑战。在基于使用量、基于结果和混合定价模型下，计费系统不能宕机——即使您的产品出现故障也不行。它支撑着收入、客户体验和财务报告。在大规模场景下，这意味着需要以四个九的可靠性实时处理数百万个相互依赖的事件，同时确保变更能够级联传播到定价、积分、仪表板和账本。本次演讲分享了真正大规模计费所需的基础设施原则——可扩展性、可靠性、模块化、编排和可扩展性。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Metronome 为您呈现。
